name: PS_A_Medicaid
description: [I favor expanding Medicaid insurance benefits for low income families to provide coverage for treatment of opioid use disorders…] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_B_Naloxone
description: [I favor making naloxone…widely available and affordable without a prescription] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_C_Mandatory
description: [I believe that making drug treatment mandatory is an effective way to help people with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_D_GovSpend
description: [I favor increasing government spending to improve treatment of opioid use disorders] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: DS_E_Schools
description: [High schools and colleges should be allowed to dismiss or expel a person with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: DS_F_Physicians
description: [Physicians and other healthcare providers should be allowed to refuse to treat a person with an opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: DS_G_Employers
description: [Employers should be allowed to deny employment to a person with a current opioid use disorder] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: DS_H_Landlords
description: [Landlords should be allowed to deny housing to a person with a current opioid use disorder/addiction] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: Release_Incarcerated
description: [Jails and Prisons should evaluate whether those convicted of non-violent crimes should be released to prevent the spread of COVID-19 within jails/prisons] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_A_HistoryWork
description: [I would be willing to have a person with a past history of opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_B_HistoryMarry
description: [I am comfortable having a person with a past history of opioid use disorder marry into my family] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_C_CurrentWork
description: [I would be willing to have a person with a current opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_D_CurrentMarry
description: [I would be comfortable having a person with a current opioid use disorder marry into my family] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_E_Dangerous
description: [People with a current opioid use disorder…are more dangerous than the general population] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_F_Trust
description: [A person who currently has opioid use disorder…cannot be trusted] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?
